description:
We are all guilty of procrastinating at one point or another. We say things like, "Too busy." "Too risky." "Too broke." or "Too Tired." Of course this can be true in some cases, yet in most cases it is just an excuse. In this course we will tackle some of the negative effects, the patterns, the do's and don'ts as well as the steps you must take to overcome procrastination. Procrastination is a time killer, don’t give in.

“I can’t think about that right now. If I do, I’ll go crazy.” or “After all… tomorrow is another day!” -Scarlett O’Hara

Make this year a successful year, stop procrastinating! Part of this course was previously a teleseminar and because of the large number of positive feedback I have decided to share this course with you. In this course I will share with you 9 steps to overcoming procrastination.
title: 9 Steps To Overcoming Procrastination: Time Thief
